title: Plugging in $$x=2$$
text: When $$x$$ is $$2$$, we get the maximum value of this equation, which is $$-\sqrt{2-2}=0$$.

title: Interval Notation
text: The expression $$y \leq 0$$ written in interval notation is $$(-\infty,0]$$.
